spatial_accuracy.notes: Room placement is mostly correct. Wall alignment shows some discrepancies, particularly in the lower left and right sections. Door placement is generally accurate, but orientations are incorrect for some doors. Windows are entirely missing. Room proportions are mostly maintained, but some wall segments show minor distortion.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is inconsistent in some areas. Door embedding is not consistently clean. Adjacency relationships are mostly correct. No missing rooms, but significant structural elements (like windows) are missing. No hallucinated rooms.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is generally accurate, but some items are slightly off. Scale consistency is fair, but some furniture appears slightly oversized relative to the rooms.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The isometric camera is mostly correct. Orthographic projection seems accurate. Lighting quality is decent but could be improved. Some geometry appears slightly rounded or soft, not perfectly clean. Visual clarity and composition are good.

detected_errors.description: All windows are missing from the exterior walls.
The door to the W/C is oriented incorrectly (swing direction is inward, not outward as implied by the plan).
The door to the closet next to the W/C is oriented incorrectly (swing direction is inward, not outward).
The dimensions of the wall segment between the Living Room and Dining Room appear slightly distorted/misaligned compared to the plan.
The exterior wall segment near the bottom left of the Living Room shows slight misalignment/distortion.
The wall thickness in several sections appears less consistent than the uniform representation in the floor plan.
The island in the Kitchen is slightly shifted compared to the plan.
The stairs geometry appears soft/rounded and lacks sharp definition.
The entry door to the pantry is a full door in the render, but depicted as a pocket/sliding door in the plan.
